I will send the winner the payment addressSNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.SHIPPING: 23 CHF with tracking anywhere in the US and worldwide                  20 CHF with tracking in the EU                   7 CHF with tracking in SwitzerlandEscrow allowed, winner pays fees.Thank you and good luck
